faqItems.a1: Depends on complexity. Every project starts with a discovery call to define timeline and scope.
faqItems.a2: Yes. Clients, services and booking history: contact us to evaluate migration.
faqItems.a3: The PWA installs on your smartphone and lets you view bookings and profile offline.
faqItems.a4: Payment terms agreed at activation. Setup can be spread over 6 or 12 months.
faqItems.q5: Is there a limit on bookings?
faqItems.a5: No. Plans differ by vertical: Studio (Beauty) and Operativo (Restaurant).
faqItems.a6: Email support for all. With Operativo: priority and dedicated support at launch.
faqItems.q7: Can I use my logo and colours?
faqItems.a7: Yes. All plans include branding: logo, colours and your business name in the app.
faqItems.a8: Encryption, automated backups and GDPR. Data in Europe.
faqItems.a9: Yes. The change applies from the next billing cycle.
faqItems.a10: Always with a discovery call. You tell us your business and we propose the right solution.
faqItems.q11: How do you guarantee no duplicate orders or bookings?
faqItems.a11: We use idempotent keys: each operation is uniquely identified, so retries do not create double bookings or double orders.
faqItems.q12: What do "reliable jobs" and "robust notifications" mean?
faqItems.a12: Background jobs (reminders, sync) use locks to avoid double execution. Notifications correctly handle expired subscriptions and disconnected devices, without cascade errors.
